result.title: D7.1. Plan for the Dissemination and Exploitation of Results
result.description: The plan for dissemination and exploitation of the results of the project will be presented in this deliverable, according to the activities that will be developed in WP7. IREC and ONYX will contribute to this WP with the data and inputs provided by the other partners.
